backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing contact form submissions in a map with submit, list, and lookup functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing UI changes and associated files for contact page and form styling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to their high-level behavioral summaries.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment checklist covering build, styling, routing, testing, and production verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme tokens and dark mode variables defining global color and layout styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, root mount node, and main script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all site routes including blog article pages.
frontend/src/components/blog/ArticleSide: Two-column article layout with sticky image card and flexible content positioning.
frontend/src/components/common/Container: Wrapper component applying consistent max-width and horizontal padding.
frontend/src/components/common/GradientB: Transparent structural wrapper preserving layout spacing without gradients.
Configurable card component with optional icon, description, and custom text classes.
frontend/src/components/common/MotionGra: Empty placeholder file for a removed animated background component.
frontend/src/components/common/OceanAnim: Empty placeholder file for an unused ocean background component.
frontend/src/components/common/ProfilePo: Reusable portrait component with gradient glow, ring styling, and size variants.
frontend/src/components/common/RightSide: Empty placeholder for a right‑side portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionCo: Empty placeholder for a corner portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionMe: Empty placeholder for a medium portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/ShareSite: Card that displays the canonical site URL with copy-to-clipboard and open-link actions.
frontend/src/components/common/StaticWat: Renders static waterfall background and overlay for global page readability.
frontend/src/components/common/Waterfall: Empty placeholder for a video-based waterfall background component.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Handles contact form state, validation, and submission using a custom hook and displays errors and status updates.
frontend/src/components/contact/SubmitSt: Displays success or error alerts based on contact form submission results.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Renders the homepage hero section with intro text, call-to-action buttons, and stats.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides responsive site navigation with desktop links and a mobile sheet menu, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the footer with branding, quick links, contact prompt, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout including background, header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Displays tab-based project category filters and notifies parent on selection changes.
Shows a grid of project cards with titles, descriptions, tools, and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillCate: Displays a skill category card containing multiple skill meters.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillMete: Renders a single skill progress bar with name and percentage.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillsDet: Outputs detailed skill sections including images, descriptions, and key areas, with optional heading.
frontend/src/data/blogArticles.ts: Defines the BlogArticle interface and provides an array of article objects with metadata and structured content sections.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines the Project interface and exports a list of project entries with descriptions, categories, tools, and optional links.
frontend/src/data/skillsDetails.ts: Defines the SkillDetail interface and exports detailed skill categories and descriptions for multiple skill areas.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that detects the user's reduced-motion preference via a media query.
Provides a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, color variables, dark mode theming, global styles, and static waterfall background effects.
frontend/src/lib/assetPaths.ts: Utility functions to normalize asset paths and return a fallback image path.
frontend/src/lib/emailValidation.ts: Exports a simple email validation function using a regex pattern.
frontend/src/lib/portrait.ts: Exports a centralized portrait image path with URL encoding and consistent alt text.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Provides a helper to set document title and meta/OG tags, always overriding the title with a fixed value.
frontend/src/lib/siteUrl.ts: Computes a canonical site URL based on the current origin and top-level path segment.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with biography content and sets basic SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogDigitalMarke: Renders the digital marketing blog article using a side‑by‑side layout, loading article data, SEO metadata, and handling image fallback.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogGraphicDesig: Displays the graphic design blog article with SEO setup, dynamic image loading, and a right‑aligned image layout.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogLawLegalArti: Shows the law and legal blog article, applying SEO metadata, loading content sections, and handling image errors.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogVideoEditing: Renders the video editing blog article with side‑by‑side layout, SEO initialization, and image fallback logic.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogWebDesignDev: Displays the web design and development blog article, setting SEO details and rendering content with a right‑aligned image layout.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Displays a grid of blog articles with fallback image handling and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact information, a contact form, and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the hero section for the home page and sets full SEO/OG metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows project filters, a portfolio grid, a skills section, and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists service offerings with icons and descriptions and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Displays detailed skills content and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for a centered container and extended design system.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing the project state, required theme changes, page updates, known issues, and architectural notes for a multi-page portfolio site rebuild.
